We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private SwissArmyKnife _swiss;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_swiss = SWISS(symbol, period, delta, tool);

// In OnData()
if (_swiss.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "SWISS Current", _swiss.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.swiss = self.SWISS(symbol, period, delta, tool)

# In OnData()
if self.swiss.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SWISS Current", self.swiss.Current);
